original_text: It was like this for 20 years as I worked like a slave for you. I worked for 14 years to pay you for your two daughters. Then I worked for six years for your sheep and goats. You changed what you paid me at least ten times!
korean_text: 내가 외삼촌의 집에 있는 이 이십 년 동안 외삼촌의 두 딸을 위하여 십사 년, 외삼촌의 양 떼를 위하여 육 년을 외삼촌에게 봉사하였거니와 외삼촌께서 내 품삯을 열 번이나 바꾸셨으며

sentences.original_text: It was like this for 20 years
as I worked like a slave for you
to pay you for your two daughters
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 두 딸의 대가를 치르기 위해

sentences.original_text: Then I worked for six years
You changed what you paid me
